reviews.text: So fun like this place
Wonderful environment
The bottomless brunch at Flying Cock is great value. At night it has great music and drinks!
Great place to get together with your friends for brunch, happy hour, and everything in between!
Best vibe ever!!!! Come with your friends and you‚Äôll have a night you won‚Äôt forget. Can‚Äôt wait to come again!
Great vibes for an after work hang with your coworkers! Music levels weren‚Äôt too high for conversation
Yummy drinks!
Best Bar in Murray Hill! I live right near by and it‚Äôs a great local spot

A Murray Hill bar/pub with excellent appetizers at Happy Hour.  We shared the three-tier special and two drinks for dinner.  AC was cranking but they turned it down on request.  Even better, brownie with vanilla ice cream late one night while exploring the city.
Get the Reuben spring rolls! TRUST!
luuuvvvvv the brunch here!! thank u ella ur stunning!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
My favorite bottomless brunch in nyc, Ella was amazing!
It was so amazing!! Food so good, fresh, huge portion sizes. The bottomless brunch drinks were delicious and the servers were so attentive!

We came here for a fun girls‚Äô brunch and had the best time! The vibe was super lively and perfect for anyone looking for a good time. We did the bottomless option and loved how many drink choices there were ‚Äî Aperol spritzes, raspberry bellinis, vodka cold brews, mimosas, and more. You can even switch it up each round, which made it extra fun. Huge shoutout to our server Juan for being so quick with refills!
The whole place was decorated so cute for Halloween, the 2000s throwback playlist was amazing, and there were TVs everywhere for catching college games. For food, we tried the bananas foster French toast, burger, grilled cheese, and breakfast burrito ‚Äî all delicious and done really well.
Overall, such a great brunch spot! Perfect for birthdays or big groups ‚Äî they even offer complimentary birthday cake, a champagne toast, and party favors. Highly recommend adding this to your weekend brunch list!
I loved the bottomless brunch and the service was so good. Definitely worth it
Ella was amazing, friendly and helpful. Bottomless brunch was fantastic. Will be back again.
Great service Ella was wonderful

Great place for brunch.
The breakfast has a good amount of options, really tasty. Bottomless brunch with a good variety of drinks,, beers, mimosas , etc
The staff super friendly. Great service
Cool atmosphere .
So fun, great bar!
I LOVE THIS PLACE!!!
Great!
hell yeah
Best bar in Murray Hill!
Loveeee the Halloween decor and the atmosphere!!!!
Great vibe

This place must bring paying Google BIG BUCKS to optimize its search results. For brunch, it comes up as a top place for Bloody Mary‚Äôs or brunch in general. It‚Äôs subpar to most diners in the city (soggy fries, small portions for the huevos rancheros) but prices as a chic restaurant at $40 pp.

We came for happy hour but the place was super packed and they don‚Äôt have servers they only have two bartenders where you need to constantly go to the bar and order. It was a little difficult to get a hold of them but it‚Äôs not on them, management needs to do better. The food was TOO DIE FOR. I didn‚Äôt expect everything to be so delicious. They have really good happy hour deals. The crowd is young and lively. The hostess was very helpful and attentive.
Great for Sunday Night Football!
Really good food
The strawberry basil lemonade is amazing and the atmosphere at the bar is phenomenal. I loved the music!!
Bottomless brunch nyc
Sjukt bra
I love the rubber cocks they give best bar in Murray Hill
Love their aperol spritz flights and burgers!
We came for dinner and found it was happy hour 4-8pm! Highly recommend coming for a friends night. We had burgers and salad & a few drinks and everything was great. The service was nice as well!

The Flying Cock offers a lively and unpretentious atmosphere perfect for casual drinks and comfort food.

The menu features solid bar fare with generous portions, and the cocktails are well-crafted and reasonably priced.

The vibe is fun and energetic, making it a great spot for hanging out with friends. Service is friendly and attentive. Overall, a solid neighborhood bar with good food and drinks in a relaxed setting.
#bestbar even better name
Bottomless Brunch options are great
amazing spot! super good house margarita üëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖüëÖ‚Ä¶
George & Michelle are literally the best bartenders!!!!!!
Michele great service
Small space but a great time!!!! Bring your appetite, especially if you love college football!!!
I love this place. It‚Äôs our third time here and my wife and I travel here from outside the city just for this place. The drinks and food are amazing!
Amazing spot, great vibes, great drinks, great service.
We came in big group and were going to have to wait a while, but service was great fast we got a seat in 10. Michelle was a great bartender so attentive and social and nice
Great service
Not a good experience at all, especially the bartender George/Jorge was one of the most rude my wife and I have ever met
Bottomless brunch omg so good
Great vibes, great staff, great food!
ELLA IS THE BEST!!! The service was amazing, she was super attentive! Whenever you guys come here, you guys need to ask for Ella!!

I had a great time here for dinner with friends! It was easy to get a reservation for a large group, but I definitely recommend reserving because they were pretty busy when we came on a Wednesday. The spritz flight ($24) for their summer happy hour is a great deal, 3 full-sized drinks! They also have rotating daily drink specials like martinis, picklebacks, etc. We had oysters and the bar tower. I loved the fish tacos (perfectly crispy!), but the cauliflower and fries were average. Our server was sweet and everything came out quickly. It's somewhat loud, but I didn't have a problem hearing everyone at my table.

This spot has amazing energy for brunch, a casual dinner, or some drinks with friends. I had the Brunch Burger, which was super flavorful and juicy. All the toppings went super well together. and tried the Chest Rockwell cocktail which was super sweet and came with a lollipop as well for a fun touch. You should definitely stop by this restaurant if you‚Äôre in midtown. Great staff, upbeat atmosphere, and some really cool events as well.

I‚Äôve been here twice, about a year apart. The first time, I loved the outdoor seating with high tables‚Äîit had a great vibe. Unfortunately, those tables are gone due to the changes the city made and the current outdoor space feels really small and cramped. If outdoor dining is important to you, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it sitting outside.

That said, the food is incredible. Their $1.50 oysters are a steal‚ÄîI‚Äôve paid $40 at raw bars for smaller, less flavorful ones. The happy hour deals here are strong, and I really appreciate that they offer happy hour mocktails (only two, but still rare to see).

Overall, I do recommend this spot‚Äîbut I‚Äôll definitely be sitting inside next time.

Food was good! Good sizes. The sliders said they come with fries but the fries are inside the slider. Nachos are delicious. The happy hour 3 spritz were a disappointment, was seltzer with water, they can do better. Service was incredible

I rlly like it. The people r ooooooh so nice. The candles add a sense of romantic atmosphere that is simply unmatched.

As soon as I walk in, the aroma of fresh beer and food is indistinguishable. The atmosphere is palpable. They say the weekend doesn‚Äôt begin until you enter the Flying Cock, and I can definitely speak to the validity of that statement.

As for the seating, it is incredibly cozy. To sit here with my friends is a delight like no other. The social atmosphere is perfectly curated for intimate yet extroverted conversation.

We had such a great experience thanks to our waiter! He was incredibly attentive without ever being overbearing, and you could tell he genuinely cared about making sure everything was perfect for us. He was friendly, personable, and made the whole dinner so enjoyable. The little details‚Äîlike checking in at the right times, remembering our preferences, and keeping everything moving smoothly‚Äîreally stood out. Honestly one of the best servers I‚Äôve ever had. He turned a good meal into a great night.

The Flying Cock is hands-down one of the best spots in the city! From the moment you walk in, the atmosphere is warm, lively, and welcoming. The food and drinks are always on point, but what really makes this place shine is the service.

Marc and Savannah are absolute standouts. They go above and beyond to make sure you‚Äôre taken care of‚Äîsuper attentive, friendly, and genuinely fun to be around. Whether it‚Äôs making spot-on drink recommendations or just adding great energy to the table, they turn a good night into a great one.

If you‚Äôre looking for a spot with a buzzing vibe, great menu, and outstanding service, The Flying Cock should be at the top of your list. Can‚Äôt recommend Marc and Savannah enough!

Lovely little pub. I popped up in after a bad experience at a Union Square steak house ((USC). The bill was a third of what said cafe charged and the food was great. A simple steak baguettes, salad and fries. The atmosphere was lovely and friendly. Staff very attentive for a solo diner. Bus stop outside which was why I was local. Decided to go in after reading the menu. I don‚Äôt drink alcohol. I went back a couple of days later. Definitely will be a regular. I met a fabulous lady who will be a new friend.
Brunch was a great experience. Menu items are all very yummy. The waiter was great and very attentive. Music was bumping. Great crowd. 10/10 would recommend to a friend

The bottomless brunch deal was no joke and the food was even better. I would recommend getting a reservation if you can, but bar seating is available for walkins. We got several items, but I‚Äôd recommend the brunch burger and waffle BEC. Our waitress was fantastic and the vibes were excellent.

Oddly though, the bathrooms are unisex but they have one unlabeled stall for urinals. That is my only gripe. Everything else was great.

We had a great party at this place. The bartender was nice, the DJ played great music, we always had food. If you are looking for a place to rent for an event this could be the place. I would go back to this bar to enjoy their food and atmosphere.
4-8pm happy hour and $1.50 oysters. Great people watching bar seating outside.
Really friendly staff, great drinks, cheap brunch food, and great refill timing on bottomless brunch!
Pretty good deal if you want an unlimited drink option. Def recommend if you're young and wanna drink earlier in the day!
Been here for brunch and for lunch! Super great atmosphere and food is delish!! Highly recommend!!

One of the best happy hour spots in NYC! We stopped by for some drinks and dinner and we really enjoyed everything. The Bar Share Tower was delicious and came with three choices of bar shares. We got the Korean Style Wings, Spicy Tuna Tartare Tacos, and the Nachos. My favorite were the tacos and all of the main dishes were incredible. The Proper Fish and Chips were crispy on the outside and the Bacon Mac & Cheese was super cheesy and the Steak Frites were super flavorful.

This was the most amazing birthday brunch! We had a larger group and Aoife was amazing at helping get us all set up for the day!
The food was delicious, the drinks were DIVINE, would 10000% come back here again
Also MARC!!!!! Marc was such an incredible server for our group! We are admittedly a chaotic group and he was so on top of food and drinks and keeping the vibes high!

I love the flying cock! I‚Äôve been coming here for their love Island welcome to the villa, special watch parties, and my friends and I have the best time! They even have own little love Island theme drinks. 10 out of 10 would recommend.
Loved it here! Jason was such a sweetheart and very attentive. Definitely come here. Also the food was amazing. Jason was able to give us great recommendations. Service was spot on.

I was there on September 26. Sitting outside and drinking. There is no server,it is okay. We were told they have to take the tables, no problem. We wanted to get in bar they didn‚Äôt let us in because we had a service dog with us. The security and bartender was nice people but there is a problem with the management
My partner and I came for Sunday brunch. Great vibe. Great service. Tons of televisions to watch the games. Super reasonably priced. 10/10, would come again.

Servers are very attentive. Great food, especially after a long day at work.
Truffle Parmesan fries are generously seasoned with great truffle aioli side dip. Flying cock has affordable tasty food.

Fun and interesting HH drinks as well as on regular menu. Prices are reasonable. Highly recommend!
I haven‚Äôt had cod in so long and I‚Äôm glad this place had it with the Cesar salad. Oysters were fire for the happy hour price. Ella was a great server!!!

we present to you this amazing bottomless brunch from @theflyingcocknyc fPictured here:
1. Buffalo chicken nachos - fried egg over easy, queso fresco, mozzarella, cheddar, guacamole, jalape√±o, sour cream
2. Waffle sandwich - bacon, fried egg over-easy, American, avocado, maple syrup
3. Eggs ‚ÄúBenedict‚Äù - smoked salmon, sub scrambled egg for the poached one, toasted english muffin, hollandaise sauce, hand cut fries
4. Cinnamon roll pancakes with cream cheese frosting & syrup
5. Breakfast nachos but no fried egg

April '22
Immediate service, thank you Ella !! We had a great time ! Enjoyed the bottomless mimosas, my waffle sandwich was great !
Drinks were delightful. Food had good flavor but could‚Äôve been ‚Äúcrispier‚Äù. We weren‚Äôt disappointed though. Bar staff was friendly and great.

Honestly one of the best brunches I‚Äôve had in the city! The Brunch Burger was massive, juicy, and stacked with flavor, it was topped with bacon, egg, cheese, and avocado. I the Last Night Was a Movie cocktail as, which was just the right amount of sweet. This place has super great vibes, an awesome playlist, and our server was very attentive as well. Definitely coming back for bottomless brunch or some of the awesome happy hour deals we saw while we were there!
Place was amazing we got the bottomless brunch and they fill your drinks so fast and the service is fantastic! The food is so delicious will be back again! Eat here!
Really fun happy hour and good atmosphere. The watermelon salad is one of my faves!

Absolutely incredible food. High quality food items and drinks for a reasonable price. Vibes are also great if you go here for brunch and ask for Jackie at the bar! She makes the best cocktails ü§©‚Ä¶
Marc was an amazing server. Had a great time. 10/10.

I went to have brunch with my cousin. The location was very nice, and a bit crowded but not too busy. We ordered the unlimited Bellini and burgers. The drinks were okay, nothing to brag about. The burgers and fries were good as well. Good music & vibe overall.
Such a fun brunch, our waiter and server were so great! And food was so good, drinks were bomb! Highly recommend

Trendy vibes with indoor and outdoor seating. Happy hour prices are decent. I got their spritz flight which includes Aperol spritz, Hugo spritz and Chambord. The quality wasn't there. We also got their 2 tier bar snacks for $45. The nachos and fries were good as well as their fried cauliflower.
They made my birthday the best experience I could have ever had!! Marc was the best host ever! This experience has solely been amazing because of him!

I came here a few months ago and had probably my favorite sandwich of all time here. It‚Äôs a sandwich made from skirt steak and I ordered it rare. It was amazing. Knowing the skirt steak is not great for you I reserve coming here as a treat.

I had dinner with a friend again here in the summer and again loved my skirt steak sandwich with fries and had such a happy dinner with the company.

I came back at the invitation of a friend who asked to get brunch. We arrived early and it was probably not the best day to come because it was Santa Con. They weren‚Äôt allowing Santa‚Äôs to enter but it was very loud and most drunk crowd than normal. It is Murray hill but come on.

I put our names down and went to wait in a coffee shop close by with my boyfriend. We enjoyed our coffee and the restaurant called us to come back as our table was ready. It was a tight squeeze and after waiting all morning and the hour for the table I was told that my beloved skirt steak sandwich is only served during dinner and they would not make it for me.

I‚Äôll only come for dinner and I was very disappointed. Other than that this place is good.
Didn‚Äôt get the chance to grab a bite but I eat vegan so thankful for the burger option, bar tender super friendly and the atmosphere was nicely decorated for fall with many options for tv viewing!!

Loved the vibe and happy hour here! HH is till 7pm on weeknights and 8pm on weekends.

The cocktails were $11 and the apps were part of the happy hour! My favorite was the pork belly dumplings.

The bread pudding was a great ending to the night!

Stumbled here looking for brunch - weirdly didn't show when searching for restaurants on a Saturday morning. Guessing because it's classified as a bar? Didn't stop the place from being super busy.

I asked for the Skinny Grilled Cheese - except make it not skinny. Mission accomplished - was delicious.

Wife got the waffle breakfast sandwich. Fun but I seemed kinda tricky to eat. Probably would try something else next time.

Got the kid a stack of the pancakes - she destroyed it. Didn't really eat it - just actually turned it into an exercise in destruction. Looked like it was probably delicious though.

Staff was nice and attentive even though it was busy. Would come again for the grilled cheese alone.

On the walk in Michelle was amazing and very welcoming   She helped us out with our drink and brunch entree options. This was our first time to this establishment but will def be back again ‚ÄúMichelle thumbs up ‚Äú

I‚Äôve been going there for the past two years with my friends ‚Äîit‚Äôs my go-to place every time that we‚Äôre looking for a good conversation and good beer. And whenever Carlos serves us, we stay even longer! Incredible beer recommendations each time and great cocktails. He is kind and very patient with us! And always great vibes to keep us there longer -with great taste in music as well. The appetizers and the burgers are also very good. I‚Äôve been back and I‚Äôll go back. Recommended!
